Package com.excilys.persistance

Class CompanyDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.excilys.persistance.CompanyDAO

  • @Repository
public class CompanyDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    CompanyDAO is the class that enables to performs action on the database computer. A CompanyDAO is characterized by the following informations:
    • A companyDAO
    • A connectionDAO
    Author:
    elgharbi
